name: NSWindowTabGroup
desc: A group of windows that display together as a single tabbed window.

items.name: var identifier: NSWindow.TabbingIdentifier
items.desc: The unique identifier for a tabbed window group.

items.name: var isOverviewVisible: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating if the tab overview is currently displayed.

items.name: var isTabBarVisible: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the tabbed window group currently displays a tab bar.

items.name: var windows: [NSWindow]
items.desc: A collection of the windows that are currently grouped together by this window tab group.

items.name: var selectedWindow: NSWindow?
items.desc: The selected, or frontmost, window in the tab group.

items.name: func addWindow(NSWindow)
items.desc: Adds a window to the tab group.

items.name: func insertWindow(NSWindow, at: Int)
items.desc: Inserts a window at a specific location within the tab group.

items.name: func removeWindow(NSWindow)
items.desc: Removes a window from the tab group.
